content.detailedDescription:
Semana 49 de 2013 todos esos d��as observe en el cielo tres ovni llevando el mismo transcurso y  la misma hora.
a) 19:25 hrs. ovni avanzando hacia el suroeste de mi posici��n, trayectoria vista por un minuto.
b)19:28 hrs. ovni proveniente del sur  avanza hacia el este, llega a dos estrellas que est��n paralelas entre si y el ovni se detiene, formando un triangulo.
c)19:30 hrs. ovni proveniente del oeste hacia el este.
 los tres casos presentaban una luz muy clara y esf��rica.
content.summary: Fueron tres ovni,  formaron un triangulo y uno de ellos  después se quedo inmóvil como una estrella

content.detailedDescription: We were all standing out front of my sister in-law's house talking at approx. 10:30 pm,ready to go home on christmas eve, then out of the corner of my eye , i look up to my right, and see what i first thought to be a spot light on a helicopter moving from right to left and then stop,that's when my father in-law asks what i'm looking at ,then point out the object,i say ( i thought it was a helicopter but there is no noise coming from object, then mention how the sound go forward on a helicopter, but it is silent,after now everybody is looking at the object for approx. 10 to 15 second ,then an orb out of the top swings down to the bottom, and and orb out of the bottom swings up to the top, leaving a smaller orb with under it the larger orb and below it another smaller orb, that caused a pretty go commotion in the group watching, after 10 to 2o seconds or so,then like  two small explosion the smaller orb's each broke up into 6- 7- 8- smaller orb's and exited in erratic flight away at an  extreme rate of speed, after we could not see the small orb's,then a few seconds later the large orb left at an also extreme of speed, and over, i have tried to figure out what it was that we saw that night, then knowing that life other than our own does exist, and trying to understand how a craft did what it did, it wasn't let the smaller orb came out of the craft, but m it was like the orb broke up or split up into the smaller orb's....It was or christmas eve show
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Christmas eveapprox 22 years ago,  my wife two children,her sister and husband  with his parents, and my in-laws and i

content.detailedDescription: We observed an amber orb flying over the bricktown area of ocean county. the object dropped two small amber orbs that disappeared within two seconds. i filmed with iphone after safely pulling over. earlier in evening a large triangle shaped craft seen over ocean grove nj approx. 15 miles north. object was no longer visible after a u turn.
content.summary: Orange orb ejecting other orbs.

content.detailedDescription: There were no stars in the night sky due to being overcast. that's what brought my attention to it. when i looked at it again it seemed to have a  more stable structure. i also am wondering if what i saw was a reflection of the international space station? the best look that i got at it with my nocs seemed to have an iss type of structure from photos i have seen of the iss. before that with my first look through the nocs it seemed like a changing honey comb/pentagonal structure. the object was in a stationary position as it changed position in the sky during the earth's rotation. it was brighter than any star i have ever seen. if someone has a way of researching this to see if the iss would have been in the sky at this position in relation to my location and time of the sighting it could possibly be used to eliminate or prove my sighting as something not of this world. the one thing that i keep going back to in my mind is that it was observable when no stars could be seen due to cloudy overcast.
content.summary: I looked at it through my nocs and it seemed to have changing structure.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 9, 2014 i was trying out my gopro hero2 camera as a dash-cam while returning home from a friends house. the camera was placed unsecured on the center speaker of the dashboard of my ford fusion and recording began from my friends drive-way and discontinued approximately 2 minutes after the object appeared (not sure why recording stopped). at the time i did not notice the object or anything out of the ordinary. i first noticed the object upon viewing the video. the object immediately struck me as odd. the size and speed of the object seem out of place with other air traffic that i have observed in the area. it seems to me to be a very large object moving very fast at a very high altitude. from my limited ability to study the video i have considered the following: a) a reflection in the windshield; dismissed because it appears to go behind the trees and dim behind clouds. b) an airplane; not entirely dismissed, but inconsistent with other observed air traffic. c) the international space station; still my best guess due to direction of travel and relation to the sun, but i was not able to confirm that the iss was traveling along this path at that time. i have attached a video clip of the object that includes the original video and a zoomed repeat of the same footage. in the original footage the object appears to emerge from behind the clouds about one quarter of the screen from the left and a quarter from the top and is quickly and briefly obscured by a tree, then is clearly seen until it flies out of picture near the top and center of the picture.

i still have the original file in full on the memory card in the camera. i have not removed the video card from the camera. i just copied the file to my computer and cut the clip from the copied file.

it is probably an airplane, but that doesn't feel right to me when i see it. perhaps you can confirm that it was an airplane. that would make me feel better. it is just bugging me.
content.summary: Dash-cam captured flying object near crystal lake, il.

content.detailedDescription: While standing outdoors at the manheim auto auction site in ocoee, florida our crew noticed an unusual ring around the sun. the day was bright and sunny with a few light clouds in the sky.  the ring around the sun was quite large and the outer edge had orange, yellow, and blue rings and the inside of the large ring was darker than the rest of the sky.  we quickly learned that this phenomenon was called a corona.  amazed at the site of this large ring around the sun, which i have never viewed before, i took 14 pictures with my iphone 5.  the time lapses between the pictures was not noted at the time.  but i can remember taking several pictures back to back as quick as i could touch the phone and within seconds during two different times.  being unaware of the object in the photo until the pictures were downloaded onto my desktop computer, when i pulled them up on photo gallery i got goose bumps, and said to myself, "i believe i just photographed a ufo".  and after viewing the pictures the object seemed to travel quite far in the short space of time it took to hit the iphone to snap the picture.  the pictures show the object at different points after each photograph was taken.  there seems to be two objects in a photo, one a bright white and one purple.   one picture seems to show an unusual reflection of yellow and purple light from the white ufo.  the objects seem to disappear behind the sun and re-appear to the left of the sun.  the last picture taken showed the white object near the bottom of the sun and the purple object moving down away from the sun with a purple beam in front of it. the pictures are in sequential order and 4 were not included because of limited space.  the last photo, 10th, was actually the last photo taken.  hopefully, a travel path can be determined from the photos.  it would seem probable that more photographs were taken of this corona, hopefully, these are not the only photographs you receive.
content.summary: While taking pictures (14 total) of today's sun, a corona appeared, an object appeared in photograph's and moved to different positions as seen in the photo's.  the object disappeared behind sun in one photo.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My famil and i were heading to festus wal-mart my wife seen the lights at first over the treetops. i spead up and got off at the herky exit, and turned around and headed back to pevely mo i seen a huge orb ascending into the sky
sky. once we made it back to pevely we seen a crowd had started to view the objects flying in the sky almost like they were playing a game of some sort flashing in the sky.

today i had recived a text from a friend i told about the sighting
she had told me the local news was looking for witnesses well we got the lights on camera.

i had thought the smer objects were people
playing with some remote control flying toys, but once i made the uturn
i realized the large orb was not a toy.

the large orb was heading sw thats when we seen the helicopters coming in after the object.

i lost sight because we were at the gas station watching and pretty much left while the lights frolicked in the air.
content.summary: Me and my family heading south torwards festus.

content.detailedDescription:
Leaning up against porch and saw two bright lights in sky hovering   for five minutes and then they took off toward the east together
they were balls of light about eight feet apart and very bright
content.summary: Saw two bright lights eight feet apart

content.detailedDescription:
A group of 4 men driving from denver saw a meteor and followed it up a road toward a hill and when they got there they saw a ufo land
one man got out of the vehicle and tried to shoot at it but the gun misfired
so he ran off into the dark
the car stalled and two men got out of it and went towards the ufo 
it was a disk with a dome and two revolving plates going in different directions it was black and silver with a tail with a red light on it
it had orange and yellow lights that glowed
they saw to very large men exit the ufo both about ten feet tall they had very long arms that reached to their shins  one entity picked up a rock half the size of a vw bug and carried it into the ufo the other entity pulled a giant bush out of the ground and put it into the ufo 
the ufo hummed like burnt wiring but had no smell
they saw it glow orange and yellow and lift off the ground and go straight up 
they tried to find the man who ran off into the dark but decided to go back down the narrow road 
yellow lights followed them and then they were stopped by a road block
they couldn't turn around so they stopped.  five men dressed in black shiny helmets that went to their shoulders and wore one piece braided uniforms but the boots were very weird  they had toes
the men would not let them pass and came up to the car windows on both sides
it seemed to them they were there a long time most of the night
the next thing they remember they are back in denver in their building with their car parked in the lot
they have no memory of how they got home
the man who ran off in the desert showed up in denver two and one half days later with no memory of how he got home.  all four subjects had the same story   it was thought it should be reported at the time but they didn't know to who.  
one of the men is reporting it now in case it correlates to other events at that time
content.summary: Thought they saw a meteor followed it and found a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
She was out side her home in the evening and was abducted
she never saw a craft or entities
she woke up in different country  thought it was south america
the ufo was landed and reddish and sitting on a hill 
many little greys were looking under the ufo to see if the hill could support the crafts weight
when she went inside the craft she saw many little greys in little rooms or stations
she went up inside the dome area   then she went out side and 
out on a bridge into a city (they)wanted her to pick up certain people and bring them into ufo so she went 40 feet down and had people follow us back up in side the ufo  then many people were brought up into the ufo to save them from the volcano and lava coming down
she spent the night getting people into the craft
the next day she was set down at her home in a 2 person pod   
they asked her "do you know what your gift is?"
she was a smart mouth 17 year old and said "if you're so smart you tell me"
she feels if she had been nicer they would have told her
she feels she was chosen to help rescue people from a volcano and was 
scared for a while but had no lasting effects other than wanting to tell some
one about it.  she recalls she had no marks or health problems afterward

she feels she may have been abducted when she and her friend would head out to go to orlando and never make it always waking up in the car on the side of the road  
this happened prior to her memories of waking up in south america
she says her two brothers have had experiences also
content.summary: Was out side in the evening and woke up out side a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting by the window at my friends place in central london  looking up at the sky before a flight i had  early the next morning. while i was looking up i saw a bright star and was only joking with my friend telling her it was a ufo because i have always believed that the universe is infinite and we are definetely not alone. my friend didn't believe me  at first but then the light started reflecting this radiating white  aura of some sort. we kept watching and shorttly after that we watched about 6 other small orbs slowly drop  down and  the clouds retained  the objects pulsating light. we kept watching for another hour to see what they actually were and then countless more came down in the same manner. after that we realized that the objects were in a structular pattern of some sort. what really made me believe was when a couple of them started moving, and they were fasted objects i have ever seen moving in  the sky and what was strange is that the object could change its direction by around  5 degrees or so in the sky.
content.summary: Changed my reality and everyone should be aware of the truth that actually exists

content.detailedDescription: 6 p.M. daylight sighting. all going same path but different parallels. first object going west to east but behind my position. second object west to east also same direction but behind my position coming closer to be directly above head. third object saw it coming and this one was in the path of my present position i had to run about 200 feet for it to come directly above my head. when it came directly above my head i realized it was much smaller and much closer than i had guessed from the previous two. very clear sighting of a silver or chrome pyramid with rounded points and no entrance or exit visible smooth all over it was slowly spinning and moving in a straight path. then there was a fourth but to far in front of me to identify it's shape. then a fifth and sixth which traveled together. feelings thought it was just not identifiable. when overhead i couldn't move or take my eyes off of it identifiable for 20 seconds and i yelled loudly for others to come, but wasn't about to leave my position or take my eyes off it.
content.summary: All craft moving in same direction west to east but a different parallel like a scan.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i see this guy standing in the corner of the street looking up towards the sun, it's a beautiful day in miami, clear blue skies.  this guy is looking up and trying to take a picture. i, ms.Curious, was about to make a right turn but when i saw him looking up so intently i quickly stopped, grabbed my cell pointed towards the sun and snapped a pic but i actually and accidentally took 2 pictures back to back. i kept driving because truthfully i did not see anything because the sun was blinding as you can imagine. i completely forgot about the pictures until sunday night and that's when i saw it, is it a planet, the moon? pardon my ignorance by the way...I would really like to know what it is. it looks like an orb/sphere and the light around it? and there's a difference in distance of it from the tree from one pic to the next.
content.summary: What's that above the trees, is it a planet, the moon?

content.detailedDescription: On the night of sunday, april 6th, 2014 at approximately 8:30 pm i was outside my patio area behind my house with my 2 dogs. i looked up to the sky and it was clear. i then noticed 2 orange/red/yellow orbs, 1 behind the other moving slowly without any sound in a straight path going from south to northeast. i watched as they went over me and when they were about approximately a few thousand feet from me it looked like a fog/mist enveloped the orbs and then they disappeared.  then i looked back to the south where i first saw them and another was coming in the same direction. that night i counted a total of 9. at one point i brought the dogs in and grabbed my cell phone. i have a short video and several photos on my cell phone that i could not download into this website.
content.summary: 9 orbs with no sound moving in a straight path then enveloped in a ball of mist and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was at my house with my parents visiting. they told me to come upstairs where they were sleeping to view this weird object. i set in the bed looked out the window which faces east and saw a bright object. i grabbed my binoculars and looked at the time. it was 0530. looking through the binoculars through the trees i saw a cross shapped object that had a central light with three lights in each direction to form a cross. these lights would pulsate at times. the object didnt seem to move and thought perhaps it was astronomic in nature, but could not explain the formation or pulsating lights. my parents said it shows up around 0530 and goes away around day break. saw this object again this morning and wanted to report it. this object was in the direction of fort bragg, but didnt think it was a black project craft due to its cross shaped design. at times it seemed to get smaller but unsure as to whether that meant the object was moving or not.
content.summary: Seen ufo several times. cross shapped with white lights that pulse. disappears around dawn

content.detailedDescription:
Family sitting out in the evening with the moon out saw three cigar shaped craft pass in front of the moon.  they were as big or bigger than commercial aircraft and flying high and fast  they were silver with a red non pulsating light in the center of the craft
soon four more passed in from of the moon, the same silver cigar shape with the red light in the center
soon three more passed by but lower than the moon but still going very fast and high with the red light in the center  
they all had a vapor trail behind them and made no noise
the vapor trail made the moon appear to be in a pink haze with a while halo around it
content.summary: Saw nine cigar shaped craft pass in front or near moon

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the front porch we (6 ) people in total, saw lights, thought it was a star at first, it had green,white,blue, red lights
 it came in slow from the east and went behind cloud. a bush plane came out of cloud after the ufo went in  
the ufo was seen further away toward the west zig zaging  around  before it disappeared.
 it had a tear drop shape with the one light in front on the large side, this was the light that changed colors.
it was about 10 meters long  came from east went west zig zaged north and south and then disappeared fast
this sighting seemed to freak him out and really bothered the dogs.

mr.S. has seen grays before and says they seem to follow him where ever he goes. he is interested in talking to someone about his abductions
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw tear drop lighted object hover and go into cloud

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting happened in south africa, northriding on the 15th of april at 19:00.

my friend and i was watching the orion stars and we both noticed this object moving across the sky at a rapid speed. the object���s shape was a half moon and was huge. its wing span was from the top star of orion���s belt to the bottom star. it was approximately 30000ft altitude. 

we are situated in between two airports and constantly see planes flying over the night sky and this object was unlike any we have seen. we have a full view of the night sky and this object moved from one end of the sky to the other in a matter of 20 seconds.

the object was not an orb or shiny or had any lights on, this is why it was not a plane. the object seemed to camouflage itself to the night sky. it was like you could see through it but had some sort of structure to it because we could see the shape of a half moon. it looked like a cloud but there was no clouds at the time and it was to solid but clouds break up when they move and this object was really moving fast and clouds do not keep their structure like that when moving. it was weird, like seeing something from a star trek movie were they have a cloaking device on the plane. no sound was coming from the object and some planes past over the same position later that evening and you could hear the planes. you could fit 10 747 planes in this object.

i know what i saw and it was not a plane, swamp gas, clouds some natural phenomena or a drone ( drones are not that huge ). this object flew across the night sky and made a turn at the end of the other horizon. nothing man made can move from one end of the sky to the other so quick.
content.summary: Half moon shape object that camouflaged itself to the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was at work, outside on a smoke break. it was a bright, sunny day, with a solid blue sky with not a cloud in the entire sky and no wind blowing. i first noticed the object because there was nothing else moving above ground level. i was startled to see this thing, because it was a foreign object floating around in a place where foreign objects aren't supposed to be (in the middle of a chemical plant), so that's why i started paying attention to it. then it fascinated me, because i couldn't figure out what it was or what it was doing, so that's why i kept watching it for the 5 minutes or so until it moved out of sight.

saw a perfectly round white object about the size of a volleyball ascending at a height of about 10 feet from behind a building approximately 40 feet in front of me. it ascended slowly to a height of about 40-50 feet while traveling due north. it continued traveling due north for a half-mile or so, then stopped and came back due south until it was directly above me, then went straight up until it diminished to pinprick size and finally disappeared completely.

i first perceived the object as being circular (flat). but it never seemed to change shape regardless of my perspective of it, so i later changed my perception from circular to spherical. in retrospect, it seemed to have been a round ball of light, which never changed color or brightness in the entire time i watched it.

my reactions during the sighting were to move a short distance away from my original vantage point to get a clear view of its movement, look around for any people to witness it with me, and just be shocked at what i was seeing. a couple of people finally came by after it was ascending straight up, and i pointed it out to them. they both said it was probably either a satellite or a weather balloon and didn't think anything about it. after it disappeared, i went inside and told my boss and a coworker what i had seen. then i went to the guard-shack to see if their video cameras had by any chance captured any of this. unfortunately, it hadn't been pointed in the right direction. i mentioned it to a couple of other coworkers over the next few days, mainly hoping to hear that one of them might have seen it as well, but none of them had.

that night, i emailed my family & told them about it. i also looked for a website to report it. i wasn't aware of mufon at the time, so reported it to some other site. no clue which one it was, and never had any response from them. i actually regretted doing that later, because i figured it put me on some list of crazy people that need to be monitored.

just looked back at the emails to my family to come up with the exact date before typing this, so i see it's been 2-1/2 years since this happened. and it's still bothering me, because i have no idea what it was, and i think about it frequently. i used to think all those people seeing ufos were crazy, now i'm mad that i can't get an explanation for what i saw with my own two eyes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: White orb ascended from behind building, moved north, changed direction abruptly, moved south, hovered, moved straight up until disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: We were heading home west on 118 just past topanga in our way to the rocky peak when i first notice the bright light very low to the ground heading the opposite direction parallel to the freeway in the opposit direction. i alerted my wife and she saw it right away my 6 year old son said "a shootin' star" i told my wife that is no plane and she said no way. this as it approached and flew right by is headed toward the valley. i pulled over and watched as it speed its way east towards the 405. it became hard to track because of its speed and it's low elevation relative to ours on the hill. it appeared to be below us and we lost it in the lights if the city. it took no more than 5 or 6 seconds to travel ftom rocky peak to tampa or further west. we were already pulled over and sat there for a moment describing what what we all saw. my wife and done saw a definite blue an white glow. no sound and the speed we are guessing at around 600 to 1000 mph maybe more. not a plane no flashing lights, no sound and no way a pilot would fly that speed at night at such a low elevation. a helicopter would have disentegrated. i am just happy i was not alone once again.
content.summary: Extremely fast bright glowing flew by us like a shooting star with no trail.

content.detailedDescription: This object first appeared as a glowing light moving straight towards us at a fairly low altitude. it appeared to slow down almost straight above us as it made a slow turn toward the west and then accelerated straight up at an in un compehendable speed. there was absolutely no sound and no flashing lights. just a bright glow. the rate of speed especially for its ascent was the most astounding part of the experience. definitely not a plane nor a h��licopter. it was swift and silent.  i consider myself lucky to have chosen that moment to gave a smoke and at first thought it maybe an airplane. as it got closer i knew it was not because the light was neither green nor red. it was also way to bright. i thought maybe a helicopter but even as it was directly above us there was not even a sound. that i was struck with a perplexities and called my father out to see it. he came in time to watch the light change direction and take off straight up until the once large bright light became so small neither one if us could see it. the ascent lasted no more than 15 seconds as it vanished. both my father and i feel very blessed to have seen such a sight.
content.summary: Bright light moved quickly towards us then hovered a few seconds then ascended through a cloud and into space incredibly fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my vehicle on the way to the store.  i had only traveled 2-3 blocks from my home when i noticed a large cigar shaped object in the sky traveling in a se direction.  the weather was clear with no cloud cover.  the object appeared to be silver in color, and it was very high in the sky and appeared to be miles away from my location.  what caught my attention was both the very high altitude and the speed of the object.  it appeared to be much higher in altitude than a conventional aircraft, and it was traveling at a great speed, much faster than an aircraft appears to travel in the sky.  i only observed the object for a few seconds before it disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped object travelling at a very high rate of speed, much faster than conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: In january of 2013 i was the general manager of a full service car wash and detail facility in fort collins. during that time i was living in north denver and commuting to and from fort collins daily. on jan the 17th 2013 i was traveling south bound on i-25 around 5:40 p.M. near the longmont to dacono stretch of highway when i noticed a formation of white/yellow lights off to the southeast. i have video to collaborate this event and the thing that gets me the most is in the video the formation is a red/orange and appears to have moving elements that i could not see with the naked eye. i can also say without doubt that was not the color i observed while filming these lights. the formation hung around for 30-40 mins and i finally lost sight behind some trees getting to my home. once i was there the formation was gone. i traveled that interstate daily for almost 2 years and am quite accustomed to a large amount of air traffic heading in and out of dia to the west of i-25. i have never seen anything like this before that night. i have never seen anything like it since. i have sat on this 2 part video for over a year mostly out of my own paranoia. after having several of my close friends watch this and pressure me to release it i have decided to do so.. any help that can be given in the analysis of this video would be appreciated. i would also like to apologize for the coarse language from time to time in the videos as my excitement was getting the better of me.
content.summary: Triangular orb sighting along i-25

content.detailedDescription: Very brilliant shiny object looked on fire at times, sometimes it was round then triangle, hovered moved up and down slowly and then quickly would fall or go up. i had watched the eclipse with my friend, and we stayed up the rest of the night, early a.M. before dawn she was out on her porch and ask me to please come tell her what was in the sky, when i got there i took the telescope first and was amazed shocked and kind of frightened, because it was nothing of like anything i'd seen before. the first view i had of it, it was so low, and then i could see that it was sorta jerking in a quick direction and then it went up, came down finally and hovered for a long time, it would repeat itself, but one time while watching it, i ask my friend did you see that, it was some energy or light bolted like lightening but fast and very quick.
content.summary: Very brilliant shiny looked fire like at times it was bright

content.detailedDescription:
We were flying to palm springs from minneapolis. we had just earlier flown over the grand canyon when my partner got my attention and asked, what do you think that is? i stopped watching my movie and stared into a bright ball of light that was shining through a very hazy sky. i tried to recognize what it could be... a jet flying toward us? a volcano erupting? it seemed to be hovering near a mountain range. i quickly grabbed my camera while keeping my eyes on the object. as i watched the screen while trying to focus, i was alarmed by a very clear honeycombed pattern! i was unable to capture that image, but i've never seen anything quite like that. a smaller object then flew from the the larger object, appearing to be headed in our direction.
i continued to stare until we flew out of sight.

i'll attach a few photos in the order that i took them.
content.summary: It was exceptinally bright.

content.detailedDescription: April 15, 2014, around 1:00-1:15am, i went outside to watch the lunar eclipse and i was taking pictures and saw the red orb, or whatever it is, moving around the moon. when i first noticed it i thought it might be a plane from the airport near by.....But then i thought you dummy planes aren't round. the object moved around the moon and behind it and came out the other side. it was pretty interesting. i just kept taking pictures. i figured enough is enough and went to bed. didn't think anything about it till i showed a friend the next day and he was amazed. so here it is.
content.summary: Red disk flew around and behind the moon during eclipse, also a white orb is present

content.detailedDescription:
Came out to watch eclipse throughout night. saw the exlipse from start to finish activity of ufo istarted when moon tourned red. i saw a triangular object moving in weird directions it had one light at tip than another at far end, than at other end was a pulsating light. it was moving up down left right figure 8 very smooth gliding. than noticed to the east of it were about 1 dozen small objects flying around some shooting like flares and others blinking lights, in no order that made any sense or had a pattern, sometimes there were no blinks for a while. the smaller lights at one point got into fornation which it kind of looked like it was preparing to go into a mother ship, it had one light at the top the formation lines in the middle and one light at bottom.  some seemed to be diamond shaped but some seemed to look star like. regarldess. 
i watch the sky's often and never saw movement or anything like this before. some of the blinks of lights actually looked like this symbol -= a sold line with 2 dashes. the colors varied on all but the triangular one had stead orange lights in the corners. it took me a while to realize it was one ship or at least i thibk it was because the lights were not akways on the three points of the triangle. at one point of the night the triangle ship had a streak of white light that went from the first point heading towards the middle of ship. however it was only 4 lights but each bar was longer. example: or like these dashes but horizontal kinda like a strobe * - -- --- 
this event happened for about 2 hours fist appearance came again when moon was starting to red and they diapered as soon as the moon was back to full and normal being very bright. i assume tgat is why they left. it was about 6:15-6:39 the event ended. 
i've looked for this for a long time and was shocked by so many of them. my phone couldn't pick up the pucks as ufo were to small weird though a couple times though the icon for phone shut me out but my phone dues that from time to time. at first i thought it was a sati might but the movement was not of earth like. after 10 min i grabbed my glasses to verify what i was seeing. in addition about 5:00 the newspaper boy was delivering and he was witnessing this event as well.
content.summary: This happened during eclipse as soon as moon became red

content.detailedDescription: At approx 720 this morning i went out to smoke and saw what i first thought was a hot air balloon.   i then determined it was not as it was round and metallic like.  it did not move at all. i asked my daughter to bring me my cell phone and took sseveral pictures.   i then went in to use the bathroom for around a minute and when i returned it was gone.  it went from stationary to gone.
content.summary: Witnessed ball when smoking on patio.
